title: How to Track Your Order
content: Customers can track their orders using the 'My Orders' page in their account dashboard. Each order includes a tracking ID linked to the courier’s tracking page. Updates are available every 12 hours until delivery.

title: Payment Failed During Checkout
content: If your payment fails during checkout, verify that your card details are correct and that your bank hasn’t blocked online transactions. You can retry using another card or PayPal. For repeated issues, contact support with the error code shown.

title: How to Request a Refund
content: Refunds can be requested within 14 days of delivery through the 'Order Details' page. After approval, the refund is processed to your original payment method within 5–7 business days.

title: Changing Shipping Address After Order Placement
content: You can modify your shipping address within 1 hour of placing an order. Go to 'Order Details' → 'Edit Address'. If the order is already shipped, contact our delivery partner to redirect the parcel.

title: Product Not as Described
content: If a product differs from its description or image, you can raise a 'Not as Described' complaint. Attach clear photos and a short explanation. Our quality team will review it within 48 hours for replacement or refund.

title: How to Apply Discount Coupons
content: During checkout, enter your promo code in the 'Apply Coupon' field and click 'Apply'. The discount will appear instantly. Note that some coupons are valid only for specific product categories or order amounts.

title: Account Login Issues
content: If you’re unable to log in, try resetting your password. Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page. You’ll receive a reset link via email. If the issue persists, ensure that your email is verified.

title: Unable to Add Product to Cart
content: If adding a product to your cart fails, check product availability and ensure your internet connection is stable. Clear browser cache or try another device if the issue continues.

title: Delayed Delivery
content: Delivery might be delayed due to weather, high order volumes, or logistic partner issues. You can check real-time updates on the 'Track Order' page or contact support for priority handling.

title: Cancelling an Order
content: Orders can be cancelled before shipment from the 'My Orders' page. Once shipped, you can reject the delivery or request a return after receiving the item.

title: How to Change Password
content: To change your password, log in and go to Account → Settings → Security → Change Password. Use a mix of letters, numbers, and special characters for stronger security.

title: Multiple Items Missing from Order
content: If any items are missing, check if they were shipped separately. Sometimes, items in the same order are delivered in multiple packages. If not received within 2 days, raise a support ticket.

title: How to Contact Customer Support
content: You can reach our customer support 24/7 via live chat or email (support@shopnow.com). For urgent issues, use the 'Call Back Request' option available on the help page.

title: Redeeming Gift Cards
content: Gift cards can be applied at checkout by entering the code in the 'Gift Card' field. Remaining balances are stored automatically in your account for future use.

title: Received Wrong Product
content: If you’ve received the wrong item, initiate a return from the 'Order Details' page. Choose 'Wrong Product Received', and upload pictures of the received product for verification.

title: How to Subscribe for Back-in-Stock Alerts
content: When a product is out of stock, click 'Notify Me' on the product page. You’ll receive an email when it’s available again.

title: How to Update Contact Number
content: You can update your contact number under Account Settings → Personal Information. Ensure your number is verified through the OTP sent to your phone.

title: Product Warranty Claims
content: To claim a warranty, upload a clear copy of your invoice and product serial number via the Warranty Portal. Manufacturer approval typically takes 3–5 business days.

title: How to Exchange or Replace a Wrong Product
content: If you receive a wrong or defective product, you can request an exchange from the 'My Orders' page. Choose the order, click on 'Return or Replace', and select 'Received Wrong Item'. Our team will arrange a pickup and send you the correct product.
